name: Saigon Nightlife On Scooters
description: Experience authentic Saigon nightlife by whizzing around popular city districts on a scooter with a local English-speaking driver. Explore one of the most hidden places - alleyways and experience what Vietnam has to offer as we stop at 3 spots for local street food. We will end the tour with drinks at a cool rooftop bar with a fabulous panorama view of the city skyline.
